extendedInfo.description: Get the quickest and most intuitiv Unit Converter on Google Play!ConvertIt! is optimised for smartphones and tablets and converts 1400+ units from 90+ categories.More than 150 currency exchange rates can be updated hourly and are offline available.Features:â Copy-Conversion (Copied values from any app are converted automatically)â Optimized layouts for phones, 7-inch Tablets and 10-inch Tabletsâ Card UI (also on devices before ICS)â Search for unitsâ Real-time conversion while typingâ Great usability:  - Add Favorites  - Lists your Most Used conversions  - Sort units by names or valuesâ 90+ Categories in 20+ Languagesâ 150+ Currency Exchange Ratesâ 1400+ UnitsPermissions:Network communication - get the latest Currency Exchange Rates, load adsHardware controls - give haptic feedback (vibrate)Run at startup - for Copy-Conversion

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Simple, clean, easy to use, free and accurate.... Great app..  Nb the premium add free version is cheap too...
reviews.author: Gareth Beard

reviews.title: Very well executed
reviews.comment: Well the unit conversions are something very standard but the way it is implemented is absolutely awesome in this app. Its clean, I paid 99 c to remove the ads. I don\'t need the pro features else I would have paid for that as well.  Overall A+!! Well done.
reviews.author: Anand Saxena

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: I\'ve used many converter apps and none of them have managed to satisfy me. ConvertIt! is as beautiful as it is functional. Great job, devs!
reviews.author: Denver Lobo

reviews.title: Good looking app
reviews.comment: Very nice UI. I rate it 4 because you can\'t change theme in the free version. I\'m buying the app to get the black theme.
reviews.author: Alice Cheung

reviews.title: One small issue
reviews.comment: When swiping out the side bar, the background shouldn\'t move. Other than that, this is how a android app should look
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs a massive update
reviews.comment: Example : 9, 10 stone is less than 9,9 stone. This needs to give accurate conversion for weights and heights
reviews.author: Matt Sokolinski

reviews.title: Is there Kg to Stones and Pounds?
reviews.comment: The older generation in the UK weigh themselves not in decimal Stones, but in Stones and Pounds. I couldn\'t find \"Stones and Pounds\" as output units. I can see that it would complicate matters somewhat.  So, for them, 72.8 Kg is not 11.464038 Stones, but 11 Stones 6.496532 lb (most people would say \"Eleven stone, six and an \'alf\")  Are there other examples of conversions which yield two separate units? Well, there\'s feet and inches for a start.  I\'ll carry on using my desktop PC rather than the Galaxy S4, but it\'s not quite so portable...
reviews.author: Steve Swift

reviews.title: An awesome app
reviews.comment: Beautiful user interface, loads of conversion utilities, and it even converts bitcoin! Although the conversion rates do not update automatically and are therefore out of date by the amount of time since the app was released which can hinder currency conversion accuracy
reviews.author: Marco Scannadinari

reviews.title: Sheer Excellence! Just 1 major flaw I noticed.
reviews.comment: 1st let me tell you about the flaw - in data storage conversion it uses 1000 units as standard whereas it should be 1024. Eg.: when I try to convert 1024kB to MB it shows 1.024MB which is wrong. It is 1MB. Apart from that a beautiful app. Excellent UI. Love the real time conversion. Loads of measurement categories. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Aniruddha Pondhe

reviews.title: Suggestion
reviews.comment: Thanks for the reply, I would then suggest that you turn it off by default or that you pop up a small tutorial the first time you run the application after installing it. If all developers had these kind of processes turned on by default then non powerful devices will become sluggish quickly without the user\'s understanding of how to fix it, while they may not be using the features that the process provides. I wasn\'t even aware this feature existed because I don\'t use the app that much.
reviews.author: Jose Gamez

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Looks fantastic and functions amazingly!
reviews.author: Edward Baeg

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: Sam McCullough

reviews.title: Nice updated UI but with copy bug
reviews.comment: A good updated Holo UI look and feel, however it may have a bug which causes other apps to crash when \"copy to clipboard\" Using a nexus 4 phone with 4.3 jelly bean
reviews.author: Boon Tan

reviews.title: Best Holo concerter EVER!!!
reviews.comment: Beautiful and functional!!! 5 star for sure!
reviews.author: Ken Leung

reviews.title: Splendidly designed app.
reviews.comment: This app will sell in design alone. It also feels as if it\'s an official Google app (!) On a sidenote, it\'s a bit confusing to choose between Unit Converter Holo & Exchange Rates Holo, because the apps\' descriptions do not really highlight the differences & standout features. I\'m not sure I need both; their features seem to be overlapping each other, with Unit Converter Holo stealing the limelight.
reviews.author: Benjamin Lau

reviews.title: nice app
reviews.comment: better than other converter
reviews.author: Aman dhanjal

reviews.title: Best converter I\'ve come across
reviews.comment: The sheer amount of conversion options and the revetment gui make this the best out there
reviews.author: Muhammad Vaid

reviews.comment: Well done!
reviews.author: Noam Amiran

reviews.comment: Just perfect
reviews.author: Davor Lukenda

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Best converter app. Fast and beautiful!
reviews.author: Schwin Hongladaromp
